name: The Dartmouth Aires
description: '''The Dartmouth Aires''' is an [[Ivy League]] [[collegiate a cappella|a cappella]] group from [[Dartmouth College]] in [[Hanover, New Hampshire|Hanover]], [[New Hampshire]]. The group rose to fame in the [[The Sing-Off (season 3)|third season]] of the [[NBC]] musical competition ''[[The Sing-Off]]'', placing runner-up behind international a cappella sensation [[Pentatonix]].
